content: lemon peel stitch wash cloth by carolyn calderon the lemon peel stitch wash cloth is a pretty reversible fabric made in a double_crochet and single_crochet stitch this makes a wonderful addition to your home or a beautiful gift this is part of the relax & refresh wash cloth crochet along i used bernat softee baby cotton #3 for the smaller size and sugar n cream #4 for the larger size includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorials on how to make the stitch thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
